snippet: Responses to an Op-Ed article, including a letter from Kevin Brady, the chairman of the Congressional Joint Economic Committee.
abstract: Letter from Rep Kevin Brady comments on August 12 R Glenn Hubbard and Tim Kane Op-Ed article calling for new balanced budget amendment to the Constitution.
lead_paragraph: Responses to an Op-Ed article, including a letter from Kevin Brady, the chairman of the Congressional Joint Economic Committee.

headline.print_headline: A Balanced-Budget Amendment: For and Against
headline.main: A Balanced-Budget Amendment: For and Against
